content:
# The stone furnace is currently working and has 9 iron ore left to smelt, along with 20 iron plates already produced. 
# 
# Since I have inserted the iron ore, the furnace will continue smelting and eventually produce more iron plates. 
# 
# I will now wait for the smelting process to complete, ensuring I have enough iron plates for crafting the Assembling Machine. I will monitor the furnace's output.

# Waiting for smelting to complete (up to 30 seconds).
for _ in range(30):
    if inspect_inventory(stone_furnace)[Prototype.IronPlate] >= 5:  # Checking if I have at least 5 iron plates.
        break
    sleep(1)
else:
    raise Exception("Smelting timeout - check fuel and inputs")  # Raise an exception if smelting takes too long.
